member.name: E:UOLite2.LiteClient.onCliLocSpeech
member.summary: Called when the server sends the client a CliLoc speech packet. This is after the client processes the packet.
member.param: The client to which this applies.
The serial of the mobile/item speaking. 0xFFFFFFFF for System
The bodytype/artwork of the mobile/item speaking. 0xFFFF for System
The type of speech.
The hue of the message.
The font of the message.
The cliloc number.
The name of the speaker. "SYSTEM" for System.
The arguements string, for formatting the speech. Each arguement is seperated by a "\t".

member.name: E:UOLite2.LiteClient.onSpeech
member.summary: Called when the client recieves a "text" or "Unicode Text" packet from the server.
member.param: The client to which this applies.
The serial of the mobile/item speaking. 0xFFFFFFFF for System
The bodytype/artwork of the mobile/item speaking. 0xFFFF for System
The type of speech.
The hue of the message.
The font of the message.
The text to be displayed.
The name of the speaker. "SYSTEM" for System.

members.member: Hide this class from the user, there is no reason from him/her to see it. Simply a class to hold information about game servers when recieved from the login server.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.#ctor
member.summary: When using this new, never ever ever try to access the contents!

member.name: F:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.MemoryOffset
member.summary: Where the actual memory offset of the item is stored

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Serial
member.summary: The serial of the item.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Type
member.summary: The artwork number of that item. This is what determines what it looks like in game.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.StackID
member.summary: The number to add the the artwork number to get the artwork number of the item if it is a stack. Usualy this is 0x01.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Amount
member.summary: The number of objects in a stack.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.X
member.summary: The location of the item on the X axis. If the item is inside of a container, this represents the number of pixels within the container from the left side at which the item will be placed.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Y
member.summary: The location of the item on the Y axis. If the item is inside of a container, this represents the number of pixels from the top of the container that the item will be placed

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Z
member.summary: The location of the item on the Z axis. If the item is inside of a container this specifies the "height" of it, like if its on top of other objects.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Container
member.summary: The serial of the container of the item.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Hue
member.summary: The item's hue.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.TypeName
member.summary: Returns a string containing the ASCII name of the item artwork name. Returns "Blank" if no typename can be found.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Take(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Picks up the object.
member.param: The amount that you want to take, if it is a stack. (0 for the whole stack)
